title: History of the World Part II
description: The long anticipated sequel! See Hitler on ice! See a viking funeral! See Jews in space!
quote: When goyim attack us we’ll give them a smack, we’ll slap them right back in the face.
parent: History of the World Part I
altHero: vikings with hands on their hearts
alt2: vikings with helmets removed, but the horns remain on their heads
alt3: star of David-shaped spaceships fire lasers at each other
alt4: two rabbis look out a spaceship window
